--Switchblade--

Switchblade connects two of the damaged wire together, and the power 
flickers on, "Finally!" he exclaims quietly to himself. He comm's 
Firestrike, "Firestrike, get back to the control room, and try to 
find out where Nightstrike is, last I remember he was at the IGL, 
but after that... Anyway, I'm going to fix Perceptor now." He leaves 
the wirey inards of the ship hanging out of the control panel, and 
exits out the control room door. He walks down the hallways till he 
gets to the elevator. He heads down the elevator to his Lab 
quarters. 

"Hmmm..." thinks Switchblade as he enters his Lab. Perceptor was 
neatly attached to the table. The small dark bot grabs a few scrap 
metal parts, and a few electronics, then starts working on 
Perceptor's head.
